statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT role, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE user_id > 3 OR role = 'manager';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'user') ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM content WHERE is_published = TRUE ORDER BY title ASC;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT content_text FROM content WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_content > 2;
SELECT users.username, content.content_text FROM users JOIN content ON users.user_id = content.user_id WHERE users.role = 'editor';
SELECT permissions.role, permissions.content_type, can_create, can_edit, can_publish FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;

SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT content_id, title, published FROM content WHERE published = TRUE ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, title, published FROM content WHERE published = TRUE ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT content_id, title, author_id FROM content WHERE author_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE role = 'Editor') ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS num_roles FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING num_roles > 1 ORDER BY num_roles DESC;
